author: tfischer
msg: use java generation of sql string for column

author: tfischer
msg: Set autoIncrement=true for primary keys with idMethod=native and the platform's defaultIdMethod="identity" (i.e. all databases except oracle, postgresql and sapdb).
This behaviour can be overridden by explicitly setting autoincrement=false in the respective column

author: tfischer
msg: use the CASCADE option for dropping tables in PostgreSQL

author: tfischer
msg: changed indentation to 4 spaces each level
fixed a bug which printed a wrong error message if the test failed

author: tfischer
msg: The example files are outdated. There are up-to-date examples in the tutorial, so there is no need for extra examples.
The src/test/Torque.properties file is not used anywhere. I did run maven:test and maven runtime:test successfully without them.

I have removed these files because files which are not used anywhere tend to get outdated. In my experience, outdated files cause more trouble than non-existent files. If anybody feels these files should not have been removed, please commit a up-to-date version
